extendedInfo.description: ==============================================================IMPORTANT: CLZ Movies is NOT a stand-alone app!This is an add-on for Movie Collector for PC or Mac.(available for $29.95 here: http://www.collectorz.com/movie/ )You need Movie Collector to catalog your movie collection and EXPORT data and images to this CLZ Movies for Android.** Without Movie Collector, this app is useless! **==============================================================Are you using Collectorz.com's Movie Collector to catalog your collection of DVDs and Blu-Ray Discs?Then CLZ Movies is a great companion, to browse, sort andsearch your movie collection (and your wish list!) on your Android device.Just use the Export to CLZ Movies feature in Movie Collector toexport your existing database (including images) to this Android app.Features:* Import your collection data and images from the Windows or Mac edition  - Use Wi-Fi to transfer directly from Windows or Mac to your iPhone.  - Or: Export to a file in the Win/Mac version, then copy the file to   		your Android's SD card.* Browse your In Collection items, your Wish List, or your entire database,   using the 3 main tabs on the top left: All, Collection, Wish List* View your movie lists in 2 different views:  - List : showing a small cover, title, year, format, duration and index nr.  - Thumbnail Wall: just cover image thumbnails, but lots of em.* Sort your movie lists by Title, Year, Index or Runtime, asc. or desc.* Search your database by Title or Barcode* Group your items into folders. Choose from:   Genre, Format, Series, Year, Director, Studio, Seen it, My Rating and more...* Tap a movie in any view to go to the Movie Details page:  - Cover, cast, crew, plot, DVD/Blu-Ray details and your personal information.  - Use the Prev/Next go the previous or next movie, or just swipe.  - Shake iPhone to go to a random movie in your current list.  - Choose from 4 styles: Blue, Black, Green, White* Tap small cover image on Details Page to go the Large Cover Page:	- Use the Prev/Next go the previous or next movie, or just swipe.	- Tap the image to return to Details Page.* Supports Portrait and Landscape modes in all views and pages.REQUIREMENTS:- Movie Collector 7.x for Windows or later. or- Movie Collector 3.4 for Mac OS X (or newer)RECOMMENDED (needed to transfer data over Wi-Fi):- Wi-Fi connection to the same local network that your desktop computer is in.- Apple Bonjour service.

reviews.title: Very happy with this app
reviews.comment: I have the Movie Collector software on my PC and absolutely love it!  For $5 this neat little app allows me to quickly (for me it was less than 5 minutes) have my movie list on my Android table in a clean, readable, and even searchable form.  Works for me!
reviews.author: Scott Breivold

reviews.title: Does not meet expectations
reviews.comment: The vendor\'s website shows a lot of functionality in the iPhone version of the app, and gives the very misleading impression that the Android version has the same functionality - but this is a totally wrong impression!! The Android version is a very poor and restricted shadow of the iPhone version. Furthermore, the syncing with the PC application sucks; in my case there has been a fifty percent failure rate where either the Android app or the PC app crashed... Also I don\'t like Bonjour running permanently.
reviews.author: Andrew Fiddian-Green

reviews.title: Good app.... BUT!!....
reviews.comment: I really like the app, but it really needs the ability to add movies without having to do it on my laptop and export it to my note 2. I\'d also like the ability to scan a barcode and add it to a wish list while im out and finf a movie and scan the barcode.
reviews.author: Damien Flemmer

reviews.title: Bit rubbish for the cost
reviews.comment: Considering you also need the desktop app to use this it\'s a pretty expensive outlay for something that is essentially a list of your movie collection on your phone. You cannot edit anything or add anything and the lack of updates for the price is shocking. And with a new desktop version on the horizon for another 20 quid, you can forget it. This developer has had all he\'s getting off me
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Way over complicated
reviews.comment: PC sync over wifi works much better now, but still no sync over connect and if I add a couple of movies, I have to resync my whole collection to the app instead of just adding the new movies. This is way overdue for syncing with your cloud.
reviews.author: Nicholas Fitchett

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Refuses to sync via wifi or usb.   I installed CRAPple Bonjour and now I can\'t get rid of it. It sticks it\'s greedy little CRAPple codes into every aspect of my windows OS.  I took so long (40 minutes) in attempting to make it work because I LOVE COLLECTORZ as a company that Google won\'t give me a refund.   I\'m sorry. REALLY?  15 minutes is NOT ENOUGH TIME to test ANYTHING; let alone an android app. It\'s one aspect of android that is a FATAL FLAW!
reviews.author: JohnRobert Clark III

reviews.title: Best movie cataloguing app I have used
reviews.comment: I really like the cataloguing features overall, however, active sync between my movie collector account and the app would be nice and to be abel to see the clz movie id in the app for my titles would be nice since that is the number I use to assign to all of my movie in storage.
reviews.author: Spencer Henderson

reviews.title: This app rocks
reviews.comment: I\'m sure glad I bought this app. Those 23 one stars had me worried. CLZ Movies does everything I need to keep my collection with me. I tend to buy movies I already own and it really bummed me out. I have a 4000+ collection. Now when I see a yard sale I can check in before I buy any movies. This makes four of your great products I use. Good job!! Oh, I\'m running this (CLZ Movies) on my LG Optimus 4G (ICS) and the Movie Collector on my Windows 7 64X with no issues.
reviews.author: Louis Brown

reviews.title: Used to love it
reviews.comment: It used to work great. But since the new version came out the older version doesn\'t load on my phone.
reviews.author: Ken Hupp

reviews.title: Big disappointment
reviews.comment: Why this does not sync with the catalog I have online? Similar how the desktop application works. Why do I need to actually connect to my PC to get catalog synchronized?  With current functionality and requirement to have purchased desktop application, I do not understand why people should pay for this.
reviews.author: Tomi Huhtakallio

reviews.title: Clz movies + Buddy for Barry.. a must for all serious movie watchers.
reviews.comment: These apps are magnificent. Plain and simple.
reviews.author: Yves Pelchat

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: App is ok, but it doubles up the info
reviews.author: Glenn Prydderch

reviews.title: can`t show price
reviews.comment: this software misses price!
reviews.author: Li Ming

reviews.title: Samsung Note 10.1
reviews.comment: Latest update fixed the issues on the Note 10.1 :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Handicap
reviews.comment: Does not allow adding new movies to the database using the bar code scanner as the iphone version does
reviews.author: Wm Cov

reviews.title: Need to be able to add titles
reviews.comment: I wasn\'t going to get this until it had that ability. Then it came on sale
reviews.author: Rob Anderson

reviews.title: Clz movie app
reviews.comment: So far very good. A bit sad carrying movie info around but havent encountered any problems syncing info between computer and phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it. . .
reviews.comment: Awesome! But I wish there was a way to do things from app to the pc like add movies, change details like location, loan status, condition.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Milks the consumer
reviews.comment: Not only does this company try and milk you for every dime they can get, when I confronted support about the way they handled the latest iOS upgrade, they were very arrogant as if the customers keeping them in business aren\'t all that important and had sort of an attitude that there\'s no competition out there for them to worry about. I felt as if they were lecturing me and that is a HUGE minus for them. CLZ will never get another dime out of me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Works just as it is supposed to. However the price is a bit high, especially for the desktop application, regardless of the update discount. All in all the best cataloging software out there.
reviews.author: A Google User
